ğŸ´ How to Fork This Blog

If you'd like to create your own blog based on this one, built with VuePress v2:

  1. Go to the repository: github.com/kmbzn/blog-v2

  2. Click the Fork button at the top-right of the page.

  3. After forking, clone it to your local machine:

HTTPS
git clone https://github.com/kmbzn/blog-v2.git
cd blog-v2
SSH
git clone git@github.com:kmbzn/blog-v2.git
cd blog-v2
GitHub CLI
gh repo clone kmbzn/blog-v2
cd blog-v2

  1. Open the folder in your code editor (e.g., VS Code).

  2. Customize the content under docs/ and .vuepress/ as you like.

  3. Deploy it via GitHub Pages or your preferred static hosting.

This blog is powered by VuePress v2 for static site generation.
Make sure you have Node.js installed before building the site.
